glossdef.p: Specifies the directory where WebHelp transformation files will be generated.

p.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

glossdef.p: The output directory can be specified using the Output Directory text field from the Output tab of the Transformation Scenario Dialog.
When you are running the WebHelp transformation from command line, the output directory can be specified using -o or --output option.
